text:
Created attachment 28212
api update patch

I've updated the documentation as discussed on fop-dev. I've removed (http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/dev/api-doc.html) since it's a little misleading and I've added some information about the use of document handlers.

If you have suggestions of any amendments, please feel free to discuss them.
creator: med1985@gmail.com
